title: Situational Awareness-The Urban Preppers Ultimate Guide to Situ
description:
Situational Awareness: The Urban Preppers Ultimate Guide to Situational Awareness and Survival




Detect Danger Before It Happens and Survive Every Situation


Situational Awareness is crucial to identifying threats and potential danger. Remember,  In a dangerous situation, being aware of a threat even seconds before everyone else can keep you and your loved ones safe.


Situational Awareness is more than a skill, it is a mindset; a way of life.


*****This survival guide reveals the military and law enforcement secrets of situational awareness and how they can help you anticipate and survive danger wherever you are*****



Here Is a Preview Of What You Will Learn
Exactly what Situational Awareness is and how it can safeyour life
The different stages of awareness
How to use the color code of awareness
How to master the OODA Loop
The Combat Rule of Three
Expert Strategies to hone your observational skills
How to practice Situational Awareness in your every day life
Much, much more!
